page.title: 13HOLIDAYS FROM A SELBY SCHOOL
page.content:
Most people like going on{holiday.}A holiday is when a person does not work and not do the things he usually does. Sometimes it is when a person goes out of the country. We did a survey in our school. These are the answers we got: CLASS ABROAD BRITAIN 5 13 21 4 10 12 3 10 8 2 3 23 1 7 20
TOTALS 43 84
Class 5 is the oldest children, Class 1 the youngest. So it just shows that the most popular place to go is some- where in this country. The people who went abroad went to Greece, Spain, Holland and France.{ { Joanne Hewitt & Elaine Southern
